title: 匠魂生存配置文件
author: ezy
txt_content: 问一下匠魂生存把匠魂扩展的武士刀给封了，更改配置文件的哪里，请教一下

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
Tinkers' Survival默认不支持PlusTiC，需要修改配置，打开.minecraft\config文件夹的tinkersurvival.cfg，在
# List of mods that tools will always work for. All other mod tools will become wet noodles.
        S:MOD_TOOL_WHITELIST <
下面加入plustic，然后重启游戏

replies.author: goodmingzi
replies.txt_content: 把匠魂及所有扩展的配置文件发一下，我不太清楚匠魂的配置文件长啥样，只能现找

replies.author: ezy
replies.txt_content:
九耀龙翔 发表于 2020-5-12 11:27
Tinkers' Survival默认不支持PlusTiC，需要修改配置，打开.minecraft\config文件夹的tinkersurvival.cfg， ...
多谢大佬相告，
